item.title: ShopHandler
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:4, topic:429714”][quote author=TheLetterQArousesMe link=topic=532394.msg3891275#msg3891275 date=1326870418]

You screwed up the syntax for shops.cfg.

That’s all? I should have known, I’m pretty retarded, thank you. I guess I should have checked THAT, too.
All the shops should be like “shop = (id) tab (name) tab tab tab tab (1 1 or 2 2) tab (currency) tab item tab amount”
right?
[/quote]
Thanks for that. There was a shop that had like 8 tabs between items and amounts and I finally noticed

I didn’t bother really reading the tutorial, but it definitely replaces your loadShops() method.[/quote]

Read full topic
